text: visvasavantayini! nitiya akuratama pilipædimen allah venuven sthira vu saksiyak vasayen sitinu. janatavagen ek parsavayak kerehi (oba tula) æti jativadibhavaya (ovunta) aparadha karana lesata obava nopolambava sitimatada, (kopamana krodhayak tibuna vuvada) oba nitiyama kriyatmaka karanu. eyama parisuddhabhavayata itamat samipava ætteya. (kumana avasthavanhi vuvada) oba allahtama biya vanu. niyata vasayenma allah oba karana dæya hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
